items.title: Man arrested for allegedly threatening to shoot up airport
items.description: The man's family alerted police and he was taken into custody, authorities said.

items.title: Blue Jays in World Series for first time since 1993
items.description: The Toronto Blue Jays are back in the World Series for the first time since 1993
